name: OpenTelemetry in your CI/CD with Cyrille Le Clerc & Oleg Nenashev (Ship It! #27)
summary: In this episode, Gerhard is joined by Cyrille Le Clerc, Product Manager Lead on Observability at Elastic, and Oleg Nenashev, Principal Engineer at CloudBees. It all started with Oleg’s tweet back in July, in which he was promoting Akihiro Kiuchi’s work on Jenkins monitoring with OpenTelemetry. This was done in the cont...
